document_data.name: Darrake Harnwood
document_data.mainbody: '''Darrake Harnwood''' was a [[War Wizard]] of [[Cormyr]] until the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Relationships: For whatever reason, Harnwood was known by name to [[Marlin Stormserpent]].
document_data.History: When in [[Mirtul]] of the {{yearlinkName|1479}}, Marlin Stormserpent gathered a group to covertly appropriate the ''[[Wyverntongue Chalice]]'' from [[Castle Obarskyr]] in [[Suzail]], a group of his hirelings arrived late after having had to slay a War Wizard who was following them. Stormserpent asked if it was Darrake Harnwood, and the killer agreed. They also said that he'd been disposed of at some jakes.
